name: Villa #2
description:

name: Villa #3
description:
Experience a spacious 4BHK luxury villa in Kovalam, just a short walk from the beach.
Enjoy a private swimming pool, small lawn, AV hall, bar table, and fully equipped kitchen across three floors.
With 24/7 power backup, WiFi, TV, and a dedicated caretaker, your stay is comfortable and hassle-free.
